segments.text: Hello . Is there a package tour to Beijing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , let me see . We have a nice one on which we still have several unfilled places .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does the tour have a Chinese-speaking guide ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is the cost of the tour ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a bit expensive . Can you tell me the schedule ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I will introduce the itinerary in detail .
segments.speaker: S1
